Name: Hunter's The Bar
Review Text: Best place in the dam to have a pint or pitcher over some doobies with your friends. Been there ever since I first visited Amsterdam.

Name: Hunter's The Bar
Review Text: I really love this place. Have been coming here for years but lately the staff is not allowed to play music FREELY.!! TO MANAGEMENT!! THIS NEW PLAYLIST IS BAD TO BE GENTLE!!!! let the staff just do their thing because the musicvibe used to be great.

Name: Hunter's The Bar
Review Text: Love this.. Place! Alway's great vibe's: the staff are a hoot playing fantastic music. Also, a great place for making friendships! 🎶 Highly recommended, pun intended! 👍

Name: Hunter's The Bar
Review Text: It's meh. The beer is pretty lousy. however its one of the few places you can smoke weed inside. So its got that going for itself.

Name: Hunter's The Bar
Review Text: Rude staff who call customer a pig. Inattentive n rude to customers, enjoy more on heavy puffs himself. Partner staff is doing double work.

Name: Hunter's The Bar
Review Text: A small but cozy bar, very friendly staff, fine prices, at least that was my experience, right next to their Coffeeshop

Name: Hunter's The Bar
Review Text: The staff was really rude and unfriendly. Lazy and took puffs and drank alcohol during shift. Partner staff really worked hard.
